geography: Military fortress island serving as Marine Headquarters

keyEvents.title: Pacifista Army Deployment
keyEvents.description: Sentomaru arrives at Marineford with an army of at least twenty Pacifista units to execute the Marines' extermination strategy against Whitebeard's allied pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the full military might of the Marines and their use of Dr. Vegapunk's technology.

keyEvents.title: Squard's Betrayal of Whitebeard
keyEvents.description: On the battlefield of Marineford, Squard stabs Whitebeard after being manipulated by Akainu, marking one of the most shocking moments of the war.
keyEvents.significance: This betrayal represents the culmination of the Marines' psychological warfare tactics and becomes a pivotal moment in the Summit War.

statusHistory.description: Marineford serves as the primary battlefield for the Summit War between the Marines and Whitebeard Pirates.

culturalSignificance: Marine Headquarters - the primary military base of the World Government's naval forces
